Row.Text: Government Reforms are devoted to our system of rule, and how the state is governed.
State regulates the body of the people under our government.

[COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY]City-State[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE]The state is organized with limited territories.{1_Opinions}----------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bonuses:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+10% [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] with 3 cities or less.
